class_notes: Synchronous class attendance required. Timed, synchronous and asynchronous assessments. Pols 101Q is a prerequisite.
course_description: Examination of individual liberties guaranteed by the United States Constitution, including freedom of expression and religion; the right to privacy; and the right against age, sex, race, or economic discrimination.
prerequisites: POLS_OX 101 or POLS_OX 101Q or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
